channel.title: Animal care on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Animal care on Game6r

item.title: Animal Daycare
item.description: The Animal Care game will show you how much trouble a little kitten can bring. In the summer, ticks attack him, wanting to taste the warm blood of the animal. They will not refuse yours either, if you do not destroy the reptiles in time. But in addition to cleaning from parasites, there are still many procedures to be done so that the animal remains in perfect order.

item.title: Kitty Care And Grooming
item.description: Surely, many were looking for something like a game for girls caring for animal kittens, dogs, rats, frogs in which the main topic is. We recommend that you consider this option. Here, two kittens will bathe each other, imitating the cries of a human child when something goes wrong. If the sound hits the nerves a lot, you can turn off the sound.
